description: This file declares the Notification class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which inherits from a base Message class and provides methods to convert the notification to a string and validate it. It appears to be part of a WebSocket JSON-RPC communication layer.

classes.name: Notification
classes.description: Represents a JSON-RPC notification message in the WebSockets communication framework, providing serialization and validation functionalities.

methods.name: Notification
methods.description: Default constructor for the Notification class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the notification.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Checks whether the notification is valid.
